MAN.TITLE: steadycos
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Finds an equilibrium state of a system described by a scicos diagram

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : column vector. Continuous state. Can be set to [] if zero.
: column vector. Input. Can be set to [] if zero.
: column vector. Output. Can be set to [] if zero.
:vector, index of entries of X that are not fixed. If all can vary, set to 1:$
: vector, index of entries of U that are not fixed. If all can vary, set to 1:$
:vector, index of entries of Y that are not fixed. If all can vary, set to 1:$
:vector, index of entries of XP (derivative of X) that need not be zero. If all can vary, set to 1:$. Default [].
: scalar. Perturbation level for linearization; the following variation is used del([x;u])_i = param(1)+param(1)*1d-4*abs([x;u])

DESCRIPTION.P: Finds an equilibrium state of a general dynamical system described by a scicos diagram.

MAN.AUTHOR: R. Nikoukhah
